dc_title_s: SLAP field data sampling: Manitoba [Canada] October 30 to November 12, 2015 dataset
dc_description_s: The Soil Moisture Research Group in the Department of Geography, College of Social and Applied Human Sciences, University of Guelph, collects soil samples from various fields in Manitoba, Canada for soil temperature and dielectric constant/soil moisture measurements. The POGO probe collects soil temperature measurements from the surface of the site, 2.5cm, 5cm, and 10cm into the site. This set includes data from October 30, 2015 to November 13, 2015.
